5515 #define BUFSIZE 80
5516 #define SM_SERVERR2 89
5517 typedef void (WINAPI *PGNSI)(LPSYSTEM_INFO);
5518 
5519 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5520 
5521 static char *GetWindowsVersion()
5522 {
5523  OSVERSIONINFOEX osvi;
5524  SYSTEM_INFO si;
5525  PGNSI pGNSI;
5526  BOOL bOsVersionInfoEx;
5527  static char *strReturn = 0;
5528  char temp[512];
5529 
5530  if (strReturn == 0)
5531  strReturn = new char[2048];
5532  else
5533  return strReturn;
5534 
5535  ZeroMemory(&si, sizeof(SYSTEM_INFO));
5536  ZeroMemory(&osvi, sizeof(OSVERSIONINFOEX));
5537 
5538  // Try calling GetVersionEx using the OSVERSIONINFOEX structure.
5539  // If that fails, try using the OSVERSIONINFO structure.
5540 
5541  osvi.dwOSVersionInfoSize = sizeof(OSVERSIONINFOEX);
5542 
5543  if( !(bOsVersionInfoEx = GetVersionEx ((OSVERSIONINFO *) &osvi)) )
5544  {
5545  osvi.dwOSVersionInfoSize = sizeof (OSVERSIONINFO);
5546  if (! GetVersionEx ( (OSVERSIONINFO *) &osvi) )
5547  return "";
5548  }
5549 
5550  // Call GetNativeSystemInfo if supported or GetSystemInfo otherwise.
5551  pGNSI = (PGNSI) GetProcAddress( GetModuleHandle("kernel32.dll"),
5552  "GetNativeSystemInfo");
5553  if(NULL != pGNSI)
5554  pGNSI(&si);
5555  else GetSystemInfo(&si);
5556 
5557  switch (osvi.dwPlatformId)
5558  {
5559  // Test for the Windows NT product family.
5560  case VER_PLATFORM_WIN32_NT:
5561 
5562  // Test for the specific product.
5563  if ( osvi.dwMajorVersion == 6 && osvi.dwMinorVersion == 0 )
5564  {
5565  if( osvi.wProductType == VER_NT_WORKSTATION )
5566  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows Vista ",2048);
5567  else strlcpy(strReturn, "Windows Server \"Longhorn\" " ,2048);
5568  }
5569  if ( osvi.dwMajorVersion == 5 && osvi.dwMinorVersion == 2 )
5570  {
5571  if( GetSystemMetrics(SM_SERVERR2) )
5572  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows Server 2003 \"R2\" ",2048);
5573  else if( osvi.wProductType == VER_NT_WORKSTATION &&
5574  si.wProcessorArchitecture==PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE_AMD64)
5575  {
5576  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows XP Professional x64 Edition ",2048);
5577  }
5578  else strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows Server 2003, ",2048);
5579  }
5580  if ( osvi.dwMajorVersion == 5 && osvi.dwMinorVersion == 1 )
5581  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows XP ",2048);
5582 
5583  if ( osvi.dwMajorVersion == 5 && osvi.dwMinorVersion == 0 )
5584  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows 2000 ",2048);
5585 
5586  if ( osvi.dwMajorVersion <= 4 )
5587  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows NT ",2048);
5588 
5589  // Test for specific product on Windows NT 4.0 SP6 and later.
5590  if( bOsVersionInfoEx )
5591  {
5592  // Test for the workstation type.
5593  if ( osvi.wProductType == VER_NT_WORKSTATION &&
5594  si.wProcessorArchitecture!=PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE_AMD64)
5595  {
5596  if( osvi.dwMajorVersion == 4 )
5597  strlcat(strReturn, "Workstation 4.0 ",2048 );
5598  else if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_PERSONAL )
5599  strlcat(strReturn, "Home Edition " ,2048);
5600  else strlcat(strReturn, "Professional " ,2048);
5601  }
5602  // Test for the server type.
5603  else if ( osvi.wProductType == VER_NT_SERVER ||
5604  osvi.wProductType == VER_NT_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER )
5605  {
5606  if(osvi.dwMajorVersion==5 && osvi.dwMinorVersion==2)
5607  {
5608  if ( si.wProcessorArchitecture==PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE_IA64 )
5609  {
5610  if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_DATACENTER )
5611  strlcat(strReturn, "Datacenter Edition for Itanium-based Systems",2048 );
5612  else if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_ENTERPRISE )
5613  strlcat(strReturn, "Enterprise Edition for Itanium-based Systems" ,2048);
5614  }
5615  else if ( si.wProcessorArchitecture==PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE_AMD64 )
5616  {
5617  if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_DATACENTER )
5618  strlcat(strReturn, "Datacenter x64 Edition ",2048 );
5619  else if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_ENTERPRISE )
5620  strlcat(strReturn, "Enterprise x64 Edition ",2048 );
5621  else strlcat(strReturn, "Standard x64 Edition ",2048 );
5622  }
5623  else
5624  {
5625  if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_DATACENTER )
5626  strlcat(strReturn, "Datacenter Edition ",2048 );
5627  else if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_ENTERPRISE )
5628  strlcat(strReturn, "Enterprise Edition ",2048 );
5629  else if ( osvi.wSuiteMask == VER_SUITE_BLADE )
5630  strlcat(strReturn, "Web Edition " ,2048);
5631  else strlcat(strReturn, "Standard Edition ",2048 );
5632  }
5633  }
5634  else if(osvi.dwMajorVersion==5 && osvi.dwMinorVersion==0)
5635  {
5636  if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_DATACENTER )
5637  strlcat(strReturn, "Datacenter Server ",2048 );
5638  else if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_ENTERPRISE )
5639  strlcat(strReturn, "Advanced Server ",2048 );
5640  else strlcat(strReturn, "Server ",2048 );
5641  }
5642  else // Windows NT 4.0
5643  {
5644  if( osvi.wSuiteMask & VER_SUITE_ENTERPRISE )
5645  strlcat(strReturn, "Server 4.0, Enterprise Edition " ,2048);
5646  else strlcat(strReturn, "Server 4.0 ",2048 );
5647  }
5648  }
5649  }
5650  // Test for specific product on Windows NT 4.0 SP5 and earlier
5651  else
5652  {
5653  HKEY hKey;
5654  TCHAR szProductType[BUFSIZE];
5655  DWORD dwBufLen=BUFSIZE*sizeof(TCHAR);
5656  LONG lRet;
5657 
5658  lRet = RegOpenKeyEx( HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE,
5659  "SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\ProductOptions",
5660  0, KEY_QUERY_VALUE, &hKey );
5661  if( lRet != ERROR_SUCCESS )
5662  return "";
5663 
5664  lRet = RegQueryValueEx( hKey, "ProductType", NULL, NULL,
5665  (LPBYTE) szProductType, &dwBufLen);
5666  RegCloseKey( hKey );
5667 
5668  if( (lRet != ERROR_SUCCESS) || (dwBufLen > BUFSIZE*sizeof(TCHAR)) )
5669  return "";
5670 
5671  if ( lstrcmpi( "WINNT", szProductType) == 0 )
5672  strlcat(strReturn, "Workstation " ,2048);
5673  if ( lstrcmpi( "LANMANNT", szProductType) == 0 )
5674  strlcat(strReturn, "Server " ,2048);
5675  if ( lstrcmpi( "SERVERNT", szProductType) == 0 )
5676  strlcat(strReturn, "Advanced Server " ,2048);
5677  snprintf(temp,512, "%d.%d ", osvi.dwMajorVersion, osvi.dwMinorVersion);
5678  strlcat(strReturn, temp,2048);
5679  }
5680 
5681  // Display service pack (if any) and build number.
5682 
5683  if( osvi.dwMajorVersion == 4 &&
5684  lstrcmpi( osvi.szCSDVersion, "Service Pack 6" ) == 0 )
5685  {
5686  HKEY hKey;
5687  LONG lRet;
5688 
5689  // Test for SP6 versus SP6a.
5690  lRet = RegOpenKeyEx( HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE,
5691  "SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Hotfix\\Q246009",
5692  0, KEY_QUERY_VALUE, &hKey );
5693  if( lRet == ERROR_SUCCESS ) {
5694  snprintf(temp, 512, "Service Pack 6a (Build %d)", osvi.dwBuildNumber & 0xFFFF );
5695  strlcat(strReturn, temp,2048 );
5696  }
5697  else // Windows NT 4.0 prior to SP6a
5698  {
5699  snprintf(temp,512, "%s (Build %d)", osvi.szCSDVersion, osvi.dwBuildNumber & 0xFFFF);
5700  strlcat(strReturn, temp,2048 );
5701  }
5702 
5703  RegCloseKey( hKey );
5704  }
5705  else // not Windows NT 4.0
5706  {
5707  snprintf(temp, 512,"%s (Build %d)", osvi.szCSDVersion, osvi.dwBuildNumber & 0xFFFF);
5708  strlcat(strReturn, temp,2048 );
5709  }
5710 
5711  break;
5712 
5713  // Test for the Windows Me/98/95.
5714  case VER_PLATFORM_WIN32_WINDOWS:
5715 
5716  if (osvi.dwMajorVersion == 4 && osvi.dwMinorVersion == 0)
5717  {
5718  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows 95 ",2048);
5719  if (osvi.szCSDVersion[1]=='C' || osvi.szCSDVersion[1]=='B')
5720  strlcat(strReturn, "OSR2 " ,2048);
5721  }
5722 
5723  if (osvi.dwMajorVersion == 4 && osvi.dwMinorVersion == 10)
5724  {
5725  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows 98 ",2048);
5726  if ( osvi.szCSDVersion[1]=='A' || osvi.szCSDVersion[1]=='B')
5727  strlcat(strReturn, "SE ",2048 );
5728  }
5729 
5730  if (osvi.dwMajorVersion == 4 && osvi.dwMinorVersion == 90)
5731  {
5732  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Windows Millennium Edition",2048);
5733  }
5734  break;
5735 
5736  case VER_PLATFORM_WIN32s:
5737  strlcpy(strReturn, "Microsoft Win32s",2048);
5738  break;
5739  }
5740  return strReturn;
5741 }

5743 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5744 /// Use assembly to retrieve the L2 cache information ...
5745 
5746 static int GetL2CacheSize()
5747 {
5748  unsigned nHighestFeatureEx;
5749  int nBuff[4];
5750 
5751  __cpuid(nBuff, 0x80000000);
5752  nHighestFeatureEx = (unsigned)nBuff[0];
5753  // Get cache size
5754  if (nHighestFeatureEx >= 0x80000006) {
5755  __cpuid(nBuff, 0x80000006);
5756  return (((unsigned)nBuff[2])>>16);
5757  }
5758  else return 0;
5759 }

5761 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5762 /// Get system info for Windows NT.
5763 
5764 static void GetWinNTSysInfo(SysInfo_t *sysinfo)
5765 {
5766  SYSTEM_PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION SysPerfInfo;
5767  SYSTEM_INFO sysInfo;
5768  MEMORYSTATUSEX statex;
5769  OSVERSIONINFO OsVersionInfo;
5770  HKEY hKey;
5771  char szKeyValueString[80];
5772  DWORD szKeyValueDword;
5773  DWORD dwBufLen;
5774  LONG status;
5775  PROCNTQSI NtQuerySystemInformation;
5776 
5777  NtQuerySystemInformation = (PROCNTQSI)GetProcAddress(
5778  GetModuleHandle("ntdll"), "NtQuerySystemInformation");
5779 
5780  if (!NtQuerySystemInformation) {
5781  ::Error("GetWinNTSysInfo",
5782  "Error on GetProcAddress(NtQuerySystemInformation)");
5783  return;
5784  }
5785 
5786  status = NtQuerySystemInformation(SystemPerformanceInformation,
5787  &SysPerfInfo, sizeof(SysPerfInfo),
5788  NULL);
5789  OsVersionInfo.dwOSVersionInfoSize = sizeof(OSVERSIONINFO);
5790  GetVersionEx(&OsVersionInfo);
5791  GetSystemInfo(&sysInfo);
5792  statex.dwLength = sizeof(statex);
5793  if (!GlobalMemoryStatusEx(&statex)) {
5794  ::Error("GetWinNTSysInfo", "Error on GlobalMemoryStatusEx()");
5795  return;
5796  }
5797  sysinfo->fCpus = sysInfo.dwNumberOfProcessors;
5798  sysinfo->fPhysRam = (Int_t)(statex.ullTotalPhys >> 20);
5799  sysinfo->fOS = GetWindowsVersion();
5800  sysinfo->fModel = "";
5801  sysinfo->fCpuType = "";
5802  sysinfo->fCpuSpeed = GetCPUSpeed();
5803  sysinfo->fBusSpeed = 0; // bus speed in MHz
5804  sysinfo->fL2Cache = GetL2CacheSize();
5805 
5806  status = RegOpenKeyEx(HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, "HARDWARE\\DESCRIPTION\\System",
5807  0, KEY_QUERY_VALUE, &hKey);
5808  if (status == ERROR_SUCCESS) {
5809  dwBufLen = sizeof(szKeyValueString);
5810  RegQueryValueEx(hKey, "Identifier", NULL, NULL,(LPBYTE)szKeyValueString,
5811  &dwBufLen);
5812  sysinfo->fModel = szKeyValueString;
5813  RegCloseKey (hKey);
5814  }
5815  status = RegOpenKeyEx(HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE,
5816  "Hardware\\Description\\System\\CentralProcessor\\0",
5817  0, KEY_QUERY_VALUE, &hKey);
5818  if (status == ERROR_SUCCESS) {
5819  dwBufLen = sizeof(szKeyValueString);
5820  status = RegQueryValueEx(hKey, "ProcessorNameString", NULL, NULL,
5821  (LPBYTE)szKeyValueString, &dwBufLen);
5822  if (status == ERROR_SUCCESS)
5823  sysinfo->fCpuType = szKeyValueString;
5824  dwBufLen = sizeof(DWORD);
5825  status = RegQueryValueEx(hKey,"~MHz",NULL,NULL,(LPBYTE)&szKeyValueDword,
5826  &dwBufLen);
5827  if ((status == ERROR_SUCCESS) && ((sysinfo->fCpuSpeed <= 0) ||
5828  (sysinfo->fCpuSpeed < (szKeyValueDword >> 1))))
5829  sysinfo->fCpuSpeed = (Int_t)szKeyValueDword;
5830  RegCloseKey (hKey);
5831  }
5832  sysinfo->fCpuType.Remove(TString::kBoth, ' ');
5833  sysinfo->fModel.Remove(TString::kBoth, ' ');
5834 }
5835 
5836 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5837 /// Get CPU stat for Window. Use sampleTime to set the interval over which
5838 /// the CPU load will be measured, in ms (default 1000).
5839 
5840 static void GetWinNTCpuInfo(CpuInfo_t *cpuinfo, Int_t sampleTime)
5841 {
5842  SYSTEM_INFO sysInfo;
5843  Float_t idle_ratio, kernel_ratio, user_ratio, total_ratio;
5844  FILETIME ft_sys_idle, ft_sys_kernel, ft_sys_user, ft_fun_time;
5845  SYSTEMTIME st_fun_time;
5846 
5847  ULARGE_INTEGER ul_sys_idle, ul_sys_kernel, ul_sys_user;
5848  static ULARGE_INTEGER ul_sys_idleold = {0, 0};
5849  static ULARGE_INTEGER ul_sys_kernelold = {0, 0};
5850  static ULARGE_INTEGER ul_sys_userold = {0, 0};
5851  ULARGE_INTEGER ul_sys_idle_diff, ul_sys_kernel_diff, ul_sys_user_diff;
5852 
5853  ULARGE_INTEGER ul_fun_time;
5854  ULARGE_INTEGER ul_fun_timeold = {0, 0};
5855  ULARGE_INTEGER ul_fun_time_diff;
5856 
5857  typedef BOOL (__stdcall *GetSystemTimesProc)( LPFILETIME lpIdleTime,
5858  LPFILETIME lpKernelTime, LPFILETIME lpUserTime );
5859  static GetSystemTimesProc pGetSystemTimes = 0;
5860 
5861  HMODULE hModImagehlp = LoadLibrary( "Kernel32.dll" );
5862  if (!hModImagehlp) {
5863  ::Error("GetWinNTCpuInfo", "Error on LoadLibrary(Kernel32.dll)");
5864  return;
5865  }
5866 
5867  pGetSystemTimes = (GetSystemTimesProc) GetProcAddress( hModImagehlp,
5868  "GetSystemTimes" );
5869  if (!pGetSystemTimes) {
5870  ::Error("GetWinNTCpuInfo", "Error on GetProcAddress(GetSystemTimes)");
5871  return;
5872  }
5873  GetSystemInfo(&sysInfo);
5874 
5875 again:
5876  pGetSystemTimes(&ft_sys_idle,&ft_sys_kernel,&ft_sys_user);
5877  GetSystemTime(&st_fun_time);
5878  SystemTimeToFileTime(&st_fun_time,&ft_fun_time);
5879 
5880  memcpy(&ul_sys_idle, &ft_sys_idle, sizeof(FILETIME));
5881  memcpy(&ul_sys_kernel, &ft_sys_kernel, sizeof(FILETIME));
5882  memcpy(&ul_sys_user, &ft_sys_user, sizeof(FILETIME));
5883  memcpy(&ul_fun_time, &ft_fun_time, sizeof(FILETIME));
5884 
5885  ul_sys_idle_diff.QuadPart = ul_sys_idle.QuadPart -
5886  ul_sys_idleold.QuadPart;
5887  ul_sys_kernel_diff.QuadPart = ul_sys_kernel.QuadPart -
5888  ul_sys_kernelold.QuadPart;
5889  ul_sys_user_diff.QuadPart = ul_sys_user.QuadPart -
5890  ul_sys_userold.QuadPart;
5891 
5892  ul_fun_time_diff.QuadPart = ul_fun_time.QuadPart -
5893  ul_fun_timeold.QuadPart;
5894 
5895  ul_sys_idleold.QuadPart = ul_sys_idle.QuadPart;
5896  ul_sys_kernelold.QuadPart = ul_sys_kernel.QuadPart;
5897  ul_sys_userold.QuadPart = ul_sys_user.QuadPart;
5898 
5899  if (ul_fun_timeold.QuadPart == 0) {
5900  Sleep(sampleTime);
5901  ul_fun_timeold.QuadPart = ul_fun_time.QuadPart;
5902  goto again;
5903  }
5904  ul_fun_timeold.QuadPart = ul_fun_time.QuadPart;
5905 
5906  idle_ratio = (Float_t)(Li2Double(ul_sys_idle_diff)/
5907  Li2Double(ul_fun_time_diff))*100.0;
5908  user_ratio = (Float_t)(Li2Double(ul_sys_user_diff)/
5909  Li2Double(ul_fun_time_diff))*100.0;
5910  kernel_ratio = (Float_t)(Li2Double(ul_sys_kernel_diff)/
5911  Li2Double(ul_fun_time_diff))*100.0;
5912  idle_ratio /= (Float_t)sysInfo.dwNumberOfProcessors;
5913  user_ratio /= (Float_t)sysInfo.dwNumberOfProcessors;
5914  kernel_ratio /= (Float_t)sysInfo.dwNumberOfProcessors;
5915  total_ratio = 100.0 - idle_ratio;
5916 
5917  cpuinfo->fLoad1m = 0; // cpu load average over 1 m
5918  cpuinfo->fLoad5m = 0; // cpu load average over 5 m
5919  cpuinfo->fLoad15m = 0; // cpu load average over 15 m
5920  cpuinfo->fUser = user_ratio; // cpu user load in percentage
5921  cpuinfo->fSys = kernel_ratio; // cpu sys load in percentage
5922  cpuinfo->fTotal = total_ratio; // cpu user+sys load in percentage
5923  cpuinfo->fIdle = idle_ratio; // cpu idle percentage
5924 }
5925 
5926 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5927 /// Get VM stat for Windows NT.
5928 
5929 static void GetWinNTMemInfo(MemInfo_t *meminfo)
5930 {
5931  Long64_t total, used, free, swap_total, swap_used, swap_avail;
5932  MEMORYSTATUSEX statex;
5933  statex.dwLength = sizeof(statex);
5934  if (!GlobalMemoryStatusEx(&statex)) {
5935  ::Error("GetWinNTMemInfo", "Error on GlobalMemoryStatusEx()");
5936  return;
5937  }
5938  used = (Long64_t)(statex.ullTotalPhys - statex.ullAvailPhys);
5939  free = (Long64_t) statex.ullAvailPhys;
5940  total = (Long64_t) statex.ullTotalPhys;
5941 
5942  meminfo->fMemTotal = (Int_t) (total >> 20); // divide by 1024 * 1024
5943  meminfo->fMemUsed = (Int_t) (used >> 20);
5944  meminfo->fMemFree = (Int_t) (free >> 20);
5945 
5946  swap_total = (Long64_t)(statex.ullTotalPageFile - statex.ullTotalPhys);
5947  swap_avail = (Long64_t)(statex.ullAvailPageFile - statex.ullAvailPhys);
5948  swap_used = swap_total - swap_avail;
5949 
5950  meminfo->fSwapTotal = (Int_t) (swap_total >> 20);
5951  meminfo->fSwapUsed = (Int_t) (swap_used >> 20);
5952  meminfo->fSwapFree = (Int_t) (swap_avail >> 20);
5953 }
5954 
5955 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5956 /// Get process info for this process on Windows NT.
5957 
5958 static void GetWinNTProcInfo(ProcInfo_t *procinfo)
5959 {
5960  PROCESS_MEMORY_COUNTERS pmc;
5961  FILETIME starttime, exittime, kerneltime, usertime;
5962  timeval ru_stime, ru_utime;
5963  ULARGE_INTEGER li;
5964 
5965  typedef BOOL (__stdcall *GetProcessMemoryInfoProc)( HANDLE Process,
5966  PPROCESS_MEMORY_COUNTERS ppsmemCounters, DWORD cb );
5967  static GetProcessMemoryInfoProc pGetProcessMemoryInfo = 0;
5968 
5969  HMODULE hModImagehlp = LoadLibrary( "Psapi.dll" );
5970  if (!hModImagehlp) {
5971  ::Error("GetWinNTProcInfo", "Error on LoadLibrary(Psapi.dll)");
5972  return;
5973  }
5974 
5975  pGetProcessMemoryInfo = (GetProcessMemoryInfoProc) GetProcAddress(
5976  hModImagehlp, "GetProcessMemoryInfo" );
5977  if (!pGetProcessMemoryInfo) {
5978  ::Error("GetWinNTProcInfo",
5979  "Error on GetProcAddress(GetProcessMemoryInfo)");
5980  return;
5981  }
5982 
5983  if ( pGetProcessMemoryInfo( GetCurrentProcess(), &pmc, sizeof(pmc)) ) {
5984  procinfo->fMemResident = pmc.WorkingSetSize / 1024;
5985  procinfo->fMemVirtual = pmc.PagefileUsage / 1024;
5986  }
5987  if ( GetProcessTimes(GetCurrentProcess(), &starttime, &exittime,
5988  &kerneltime, &usertime)) {
5989 
5990  /* Convert FILETIMEs (0.1 us) to struct timeval */
5991  memcpy(&li, &kerneltime, sizeof(FILETIME));
5992  li.QuadPart /= 10L; /* Convert to microseconds */
5993  ru_stime.tv_sec = li.QuadPart / 1000000L;
5994  ru_stime.tv_usec = li.QuadPart % 1000000L;
5995 
5996  memcpy(&li, &usertime, sizeof(FILETIME));
5997  li.QuadPart /= 10L; /* Convert to microseconds */
5998  ru_utime.tv_sec = li.QuadPart / 1000000L;
5999  ru_utime.tv_usec = li.QuadPart % 1000000L;
6000 
6001  procinfo->fCpuUser = (Float_t)(ru_utime.tv_sec) +
6002  ((Float_t)(ru_utime.tv_usec) / 1000000.);
6003  procinfo->fCpuSys = (Float_t)(ru_stime.tv_sec) +
6004  ((Float_t)(ru_stime.tv_usec) / 1000000.);
6005  }
6006 }
